DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the efficacy and safety of YM060 once daily for female patients with diarrhea-predominant irritable bowel syndrome (D-IBS) for a long-term period (up to 52 weeks).
DOC.brief_title: A Long Term Study of YM060 in Female Patients With Diarrhea-predominant Irritable Bowel Syndrome
